search_queries.description: Search for papers with 'econometrics' in the title, covering the core topic directly.
Search for papers with 'econometric models' or 'econometric analysis' in the abstract, targeting discussions on models and analysis techniques.
Search for papers on econometric theory under the statistics methodology category, which is highly relevant to theoretical developments in econometrics.
Search for papers authored by Jeffrey M. Wooldridge, a prominent figure in econometrics.
Search for econometric applications in the applied statistics category, finding papers focused on practical applications.
Search for papers on time series econometrics in the statistics computation category, relevant for computational methods in time series analysis.
Search for mentions of 'panel data econometrics', covering a specific econometric methodology involving panel data.
Search for papers discussing causal inference within econometrics, targeting this important aspect of econometric analysis.
Search for papers on financial econometrics and economic forecasting, covering these two applied branches of econometric practice.
Search for econometric topics within quantitative finance categories, tapping into finance-oriented econometric research.
Search for papers mentioning structural econometric models, which are key tools in policy analysis and industrial organization.
Search for computational approaches in econometrics under the computational engineering category, useful for those interested in algorithmic developments.
Search for papers with titles mentioning non-parametric econometrics, focusing on methodologies not assuming specific parametric forms.
Search for discussions on the estimation of economic models in the statistics theory category, relevant for theoretical exploration.

search_queries.query: au:"Greene, William H." OR au:"Cameron, A. Colin"
search_queries.description: Search for papers by authors William H. Greene and A. Colin Cameron, who are influential in econometric analysis and methods.
